name: The Sons of Katie Elder
tagline: Ranch owner Katie Elder's four sons determine to avenge the murder of their father and the swindling of their mother.

name: Dragonslayer
tagline: A young wizarding apprentice is sent to kill a dragon which has been devouring girls from a nearby kingdom.

name: Chisum
tagline: Cattle baron John Chisum joins forces with Billy the Kid and Pat Garrett to fight the Lincoln County land war.

name: El Dorado
tagline: Cole Thornton, a gunfighter for hire, joins forces with an old friend, Sheriff J.P. Hara. Together with an old Indian fighter and a gambler, they help a rancher and his family fight a rival rancher that is trying to steal their water.

name: Run, Fatboy, Run
tagline: Five years after jilting his pregnant fiancée on their wedding day, out-of-shape Dennis decides to run a marathon to win her back.

name: The Sessions
tagline: A man in an iron lung who wishes to lose his virginity contacts a professional sex surrogate with the help of his therapist and priest.

name: The Diving Bell and the Butterfly
tagline: The true story of Elle editor Jean-Dominique Bauby who suffers a stroke and has to live with an almost totally paralyzed body; only his left eye isn't paralyzed.

name: The Shootist
tagline: A dying gunfighter spends his last days looking for a way to die with a minimum of pain and a maximum of dignity.

name: Les Boys II
tagline: Stan and his team are back. This time, they will meet in Chamonix to compete in an international hockey championship.

name: My Little Pony: The Movie
tagline: Ponyland comes under attack from a talking blob of purple gunk.

name: Lars and the Real Girl
tagline: A delusional young guy strikes up an unconventional relationship with a doll he finds on the Internet.

name: The Last Legion
tagline: As the Roman empire crumbles, young Romulus Augustus flees the city and embarks on a perilous voyage to Britain to track down a legion of supporters.

name: Evil Dead II
tagline: The lone survivor of an onslaught of flesh-possessing spirits holds up in a cabin with a group of strangers while the demons continue their attack.

name: Highlander
tagline: An immortal Scottish swordsman must confront the last of his immortal opponent, a murderously brutal barbarian who lusts for the fabled "Prize".

name: Cry Freedom
tagline: South African journalist Donald Woods is forced to flee the country after attempting to investigate the death in custody of his friend the black activist Steve Biko.

name: Casa de mi Padre
tagline: Scheming on a way to save their father's ranch, the Alvarez brothers find themselves in a war with Mexico's most feared drug lord.

name: Ed Wood
tagline: The mostly true story of the legendary director of awful movies and his strange group of friends and actors.

name: Against the Ropes
tagline: A fictional story inspired by North America's most famous female boxing promoter, Jackie Kallen. Her struggle to survive and succeed in a male dominated sport.

name: The Opposite of Sex
tagline: A 16-year-old girl visits her gay half-brother and ends up seducing his boyfriend, thus wreaking havoc on all of their lives.

name: Light It Up
tagline: A group of teens is bent on improving the run-down conditions of their high-school.

name: Feel the Noise
tagline: A young man from the South Bronx dreams of making it as a rapper, until a run-in with local thugs forces him to hide in Puerto Rico with the father he never knew.

name: Prêt-à-Porter
tagline: A chronicle of the interconnected lives of a group of people in the lead up to Paris Fashion Week.

name: Inventing the Abbotts
tagline: A light-hearted story of two working-class brothers courting three wealthy and beautiful sisters in a small Illinois town.

name: Basic Instinct 2
tagline: Novelist Catherine Tramell is once again in trouble with the law, and Scotland Yard appoints psychiatrist Dr. Michael Glass to evaluate her. Though, like Detective Nick Curran before him, Glass is entranced by Tramell and lured into a seductive game.

name: The Transformers: The Movie
tagline: The Autobots must stop a colossal planet consuming robot who goes after the Autobot Matrix of Leadership. At the same time, they must defend themselves against an all-out attack from the Decepticons.

name: The Hitcher
tagline: A young man who escaped the clutches of a murderous hitch-hiker is subsequently stalked, framed for the hitcher's crimes, and has his life made into hell by the same man he escaped.

name: The Bling Ring
tagline: Inspired by actual events, a group of fame-obsessed teenagers use the internet to track celebrities' whereabouts in order to rob their homes.

name: Palmetto
tagline: A recently released ex-con gets involved in a fake kidnapping scheme that turns very real.

name: Crossroads
tagline: Ralph Macchio is Lightning Boy. A kid who can make a slide guitar sing. Blind Dog is an old pro who knows it. Together, they're headed to a place where deals are made. And legends are born.

name: Night of the Living Dead
tagline: The unburied dead return to life and seek human victims.

name: Pulling Strings
tagline: After a night of drinking, Rachel, a diplomat working in Mexico City finds her world turned upside down after she's saved by Alejandro, a Mariachi singer whose visa was rejected the day before - by Rachel.

name: Stanley & Iris
tagline: A struggling widow falls in love with an illiterate short-order cook whom she teaches to read and write in her kitchen each night.

name: The Perfect Holiday
tagline: A young girl turns to a department store Santa in the hopes that he will help find a new husband for her divorced mother.

name: The Last American Virgin
tagline: The friendship of a group of young friends struggling with teen sex, drugs, and work is jeopardized by a romantic interest which may turn pals into bitter rivals.

name: The Boxer
tagline: Young Danny Flynn is released from prison after 14 years after "taking the rap" for the IRA and tries to rebuild his life in his old Belfast neighborhood.

name: Mona Lisa
tagline: George has just been released from prison, and manages to get a job driving a call girl from customer to customer. Initially they don't get on; he doesn't fit in with the high class customers Simone services. Will they ever get on?

name: Before Sunset
tagline: Nine years after Jesse and Celine first met, they encounter each other again on the French leg of Jesse's book tour.

name: Trapped in Paradise
tagline: Residents of a friendly Pennsylvania town foil three brothers' plan to rob a bank on Christmas Eve.

name: Millennium
tagline: An NTSB investigator seeking the cause of an airline disaster meets a warrior woman from 1000 years in the future.

name: Beginners
tagline: A young man is rocked by two announcements from his elderly father: that he has terminal cancer, and that he has a young male lover.

name: Leatherface: Texas Chainsaw Massacre III
tagline: A California couple and a survivalist encounter the cannibal family.

name: The Clearing
tagline: As an executive is held captive by an employee, it's up to his wife to deliver the ransom.

name: Lucky You
tagline: A hotshot poker player tries to win a tournament in Vegas, but is fighting a losing battle with his personal problems.

name: Rio Bravo
tagline: A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a cripple, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.

name: The Station Agent
tagline: When his only friend dies, a man born with dwarfism moves to rural New Jersey to live a life of solitude, only to meet a chatty hot dog vendor and a woman dealing with her own personal loss.

name: Orlando
tagline: A little ogre, different from all the others, goes searching for truth. Orlando is a human child who grows up dealing with diversity and is taught the value of respecting nature.

name: Closed Circuit
tagline: A high-profile terrorism case unexpectedly binds together two ex-lovers on the defense team - testing the limits of their loyalties and placing their lives in jeopardy.

name: Get on the Bus
tagline: A disparate group of African-American men travel by bus to Washington, DC for the Million Man March.

name: Hardware
tagline: The head of a cyborg reactivates and rebuilds itself and goes on a violent rampage in a space marine's girlfriend's apartment.

name: Spellbound
tagline: Spellbound follows eight teenagers on their quest to win the 1999 National Spelling Bee.

name: Gold Diggers: The Secret of Bear Mountain
tagline: A city girl teams up with a tomboy to solve the mystery of Bear Mountain, Molly Morgan, and the buried treasure as well as learn about true friendships.

name: One Eight Seven
tagline: After surviving a brutal attack (Instrument used was a board with nails in it) by a student, teacher Trevor Garfield moves from New York to Los Angeles.

name: Wisdom
tagline: Unable to find work after a past felony, graduate John Wisdom and his girlfriend embark on a cross-country bank-robbing spree in order to aid American farmers.

name: Surrender
tagline: A wealthy writer who has had terrible experiences with money-hungry girlfriends & ex-wives pretends to be a broke, washed-up novelist to see if the woman he loves wants him for himself or just for his money.

name: The Crime of Father Amaro
tagline: Politics and sexual passions threaten to corrupt a young, newly-ordained priest in a small Mexican town.

name: A Dangerous Method
tagline: A look at how the intense relationship between Carl Jung and Sigmund Freud gives birth to psychoanalysis.

name: Mongol: The Rise of Genghis Khan
tagline: The story recounts the early life of Genghis Khan who was a slave before going on to conquer half the world including Russia in 1206.

name: Under Fire
tagline: Three journalists in a romantic triangle are involved in political intrigue during the last days of the corrupt Somozoa regime in Nicaragua before it falls to a popular revolution in 1979.

name: Who's Your Caddy?
tagline: When a rap mogul from Atlanta tries to join a conservative country club in the Carolinas he runs into fierce opposition from the board President- but it's nothing that he and his entourage can't handle.

name: Eight Men Out
tagline: A dramatization of the Black Sox scandal when the underpaid Chicago White Sox accepted bribes to deliberately lose the 1919 World Series.

name: Nadine
tagline: In 1950s Texas, a woman trying to recover sexy photos of herself and divorce her husband witnesses a murder and uncovers corrupt land dealings.

name: For Greater Glory: The True Story of Cristiada
tagline: A chronicle of the Cristeros War (1926-1929); a war by the people of Mexico against the atheistic Mexican government.

name: Luther
tagline: During the early 16th Century idealistic German monk Martin Luther, disgusted by the materialism in the church, begins the dialogue that will lead to the Protestant Reformation.

name: The Warrior's Way
tagline: A warrior-assassin is forced to hide in a small town in the American Badlands after refusing a mission.

name: Gigli
tagline: The violent story about how a criminal lesbian, a tough-guy hit-man with a heart of gold, and a mentally challenged man came to be best friends through a hostage.

production.name: IMF Internationale Medien und Film GmbH & Co. Produktions KG

name: Phantoms
tagline: 150 dead and 350 missing in the tiny mountain town of Snowfield, Colorado. And that's only the beginning...

name: Underclassman
tagline: A young detective goes undercover at an elite private school to destroy an international stolen car ring.

name: Never Die Alone
tagline: A drug kingpin's return home touches off a turf war.

name: Some Kind of Hero
tagline: A Vietnam vet returns home from a prisoner of war camp and is greeted as a hero, but is quickly forgotten and soon discovers how tough survival is in his own country.

name: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
tagline: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.

name: The Star Chamber
tagline: Disgusted with criminals escaping the judicial system via technicalities, an idealistic young judge investigates an alternative method for punishing the guilty.

name: Mary Reilly
tagline: A housemaid falls in love with Dr. Jekyll and his darkly mysterious counterpart, Mr. Hyde.

name: Streets of Fire
tagline: A mercenary goes after his ex-girlfriend, a singer who has been kidnapped by a gang.

name: Central Station

production.name: Audiovisual Development Bureau, Ministerio da Cultura

tagline: An emotive journey of a former school teacher, who write letters for illiterate people, and a young boy, whose mother has just died, in search for the father he never knew.

name: Bordello of Blood
tagline: The cryptkeeper returns to tell the story of a funeral parlor that moonlights as a vampire bordello.

name: Loose Cannons
tagline: An unconventional cop who doesn't take any bull, is paired up with an amazing detective to capture some powerful criminals but the cop soon realizes that his by the book partner has split personality disorder.

name: Iris
tagline: True story of the lifelong romance between novelist Iris Murdoch and her husband John Bayley, from their student days through her battle with Alzheimer's disease.
